critique: The document aims to foster national unity and encourage full participation in the national defense program by eliminating discrimination. The primary emotions the President wants to elicit are joy (due to increased opportunity and fairness), and reduced fear and sadness (stemming from discrimination). There might be some surprise at the decisiveness of the order, and potentially disgust directed at the discriminatory practices being addressed. The intensity scores reflect these considerations, with joy being moderate, sadness and fear being addressed, and surprise and disgust being present but less prominent.
